ualberta.g12.adventurecreator

Class Story

  • java.lang.Object
    • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.SModel
      • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.Story
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Story
extends SModel
implements java.io.Serializable
    Models a story that would be created by an Author. Contains a list of Fragments as well as an author and a title.
    See Also:
